parameter.name: ErrorsSent
parameter.webname: Packets not transmitted due to error

parameter.name: FailedRetransCount
parameter.webname: Packets failed after exceeded retransmission count

parameter.name: RetryCount
parameter.webname: Packets that were successfully transmitted after one or more retransmissions.

parameter.name: MultipleRetryCount
parameter.webname: Packets that were successfully transmitted after more than one retransmission
